i18n.key: The ″{field}″ field does not have to be a valid password.
the ″{field}″ field is not a valid password: it must contain at least 6 characters (uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers).

the ″{field}″ field is not a valid password: it must contain at least 6 characters.
